body_html:
For efficiency, is it possible to check whether the sequence is sorted inside the function "pack_padded_sequence"?
It would be much convenient if the descending requirement is not mandatory.

body:
For efficiency, is it possible to check whether the sequence is sorted inside the function "pack_padded_sequence"? 
It would be much convenient if the descending requirement is not mandatory.
